txt.en: Imrêkh-guthlu can be found in the southern reaches of Máttugard, near Deepscrave.\n\nYou should defend Imrêkh-guthlu.
Hetbrúda can be found at Imrêkh-guthlu in Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Hetbrúda.
'I believe some dwarves have established a small outpost near the Deepscrave. We should travel there and tell them what we have learned about the Orcs at Tholmuzog.'
'Is this what the War of Three Peaks was like? I did not arrive from Erebor until the battle was nearly won, you see. It seems there is plenty more conflict to be found inside Gundabad as well!'
Defend the Stairs
Defend the Bridge
Talk to Hetbrúda at Imrêkh-guthlu

\qDon't let them get away!\q
\qTime for a bit of fun!\q
Imrêkh-guthlu must be defended!
\qCut 'em all down! This hall will be ours!\q
Defended the stair from attacking captains ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
\qNo quittin! We'll make 'em all squirm!\q
Defended the bridge from attacking defilers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Imrêkh-guthlu can be found in the southern reaches of Máttugard, near Deepscrave.\n\nYou should travel to Imrêkh-guthlu.
Hetbrúda has spoken to the dwarves at Imrêkh-guthlu and now wishes to speak with you
The dwarf-outpost of Imrêkh-guthlu borders the heavily-fortified Orc stronghold of Deepscrave in Gundabad.

'I spoke with a dwarf here named Lóssi. I told him that we were adventuring together and he says he knows you. I gave him the basic information that we gathered from the Orc-orders.\n\n'Perhaps you should speak with him further? We really should assist Lóssi and everyone at Imrêkh-guthlu. This outpost is important to securing Gundabad, after all!'

'Greetings again, [placeholder].

'Since the War of Three Peaks, I have taken an oath to never send anyone into the way of harm unless I am there at their side. I lost too many scouts, good dwarves, in those battles. That is why I have come to the very edge of Máttugard with these scouts to claim Imrêkh-guthlu, the Shielded Citadel. It is a strategic place to watch over the Deepscrave and the route through Máttugard.

'I knew there were Orcs and trolls in Máttugard, but I did not think they knew of our encampment. We shall focus on fortifying ourselves here as best we can.'

Just then, a scout of Imrêkh-guthlu blows a sharp note of alarm on his battle-horn!

'Blast! There is no time to fortify our position! We must defend ourselves now!'
Hetbrúda can be found at Imrêkh-guthlu in Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Hetbrúda.
Travel to Imrêkh-guthlu
Defended the bridge!
Lóssi can be found at Imrêkh-guthlu in Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Lóssi.
